feed.title: Lake Superior (Provincial Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Lake Superior (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:38 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Superior Provincial Park 5:00 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
Temperature: -4.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -5.6°C
Wind: SW 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Blowing snow early this evening. Local blowing snow late this evening and overnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight then light before morning. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
